article.class: content-page post-18 page type-page status-publish hentry

ul.li: E-learning – will continue on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from April 13–May 22, 2020, in order to reach the 160-day instructional requirement set by the Indiana Department of Education.
GCS Contact – The phone at the Administration Center is answered Monday-Friday from 11:00 a.m.-2:00 p.m.
Food Service – Buses will no longer be driving through neighborhoods; instead, there will be drop-off sites. For the schedule and locations of GCS and Boys & Girls Club food service, click here.
Major Saver Campaign – See the announcement here for more information.

Technology Help – Technology assistance will be available Monday-Friday from 11:00 a.m.-2:00 p.m at the Administration Center. No appointment is necessary but please maintain social distancing guidelines while waiting for help. We also encourage parents and students to use online assistance by going here or contact your students teacher.

Title 1 Preschool – If your child is 4 before August 1 and they physically live in the Goshen Community Schools district, enroll them online for our Title 1 Preschool. Enrollment packets are also available at the Registration Office only from 11-2 daily. May 1st and 8th in-person registration have been canceled. This preschool is NOT HEADSTART. It is part of GCS and is only housed in Prairie View Elementary. Transportation can be provided. It will be an AM and PM class, assigned by the program. If you have any questions please feel free to call us at 574-971-4149.”
2020 Census
Get complete census information here (Takes 5 minutes)
Find the ways to take the census here
